channel.title: Help omfg
channel.description: it keeps saying loading plz wait on screen and on bottom it keeps saying disconected....

item.title: Help omfg
item.dc:creator: @Sephiroth1 Sephiroth~
item.description:
@Sephiroth1 wrote:

no that is wrong, i bet you the server encountered some exception which “half-crashed” the server, it stuffs up so no one can log in successfully and play, but you can still log in, then you get disconnected

did the server have NPC drops enabled? if so, this is a common way to get exceptions:

you kill a NPC then the NPC dies, but before the item appears on the ground the player logs out. now the server has a NullPointerException. server crashed/got stuffed up

there is an easily way to prevent that exception btw

Read full topic
